General.Name: Castles Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Castles Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells payment solutions for the financial, retail, hospitality, and transportation sectors. Its products include Android, mobile, and EFT POS solutions; and unattended terminals, PIN pads, and other products. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.207-5, Beixin Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 231
